metadata.feature_description: Track and manage content revisions with version history and rollback capabilities

steps.action: Logged into the site as SuperUser (host)
steps.actual: Successfully logged in as SuperUser Account

steps.action: Navigated to News page and found Publisher posts
steps.actual: Found multiple Publisher posts including 'Publisher Test Post'

steps.action: Opened the post editor for 'Publisher Test Post'
steps.expected: Post editor opens with Revision History option
steps.actual: Post editor opened but only shows 3 options: Delete, Edit Post Details, Change Author. No Revision History button/tab found.

steps.action: Searched all available menus and panels for Revision History
steps.expected: Find Revision History UI somewhere in the post editor
steps.actual: Thoroughly searched all UI elements. Edit bar only contains: Delete icon, Edit Post Details icon, Change Author icon, and Close button. No Revision History or Version Tracking option exists.

steps.action: Reviewed source code for Revision History UI components
steps.expected: Find JavaScript or HTML files for Revision History UI
steps.actual: Code review confirmed: RevisionManager.cs and RevisionController.cs exist with backend revision management capabilities (GetAllChangesets, Compare, Rollback methods), but NO UI components exist. EditBarManager.js only defines panels for Settings, UnpublishedPosts, EditPostDetails, and ChangeAuthor - no RevisionHistory panel.

issues: Revision History UI is not implemented in the Publisher module. The backend code (RevisionManager.cs, RevisionController.cs) has full revision management capabilities, but there is no user-facing interface to access these features.

observations: Code suggests Revision Management feature exists at the backend level, but no UI element found to test it. Specifically:

- RevisionManager.cs (Components/Integration/) provides methods: GetPendingContent, GetLastRevision, GetLatestPendingRevision, AddPublishedRevision, AddPendingToBePublishedRevision, UpdatePendingToBePublishedRevision, DeleteLastPendingToBePublishedRevision, DeleteRevisionsByContentItemId, PublishRevision
- RevisionController.cs (Libraries/Revisions/) provides: ReviseContentItem, GetAllChangesets, StateTransition, Compare, Rollback, GetLatestRevision, HardDelete
- Revision.cs entity tracks: RevisionId, Sequence, ContentItemId, RevisionType (Revise/Rollback), State (Pending/Published/Deleted), CreatedUserId, CreatedDate, LastModifiedUserId, LastModifiedDate
- However, the Publisher module's client-side code (EditBarManager.js) only implements panels for: Settings, UnpublishedPosts, EditPostDetails, ChangeAuthor - NO RevisionHistory panel exists
- HTML Pro module has Version Tracking UI (per documentation), but Publisher module does not
The suggested test scenarios (View revision history, Compare revisions, Rollback, Delete revisions, Track author, Revision numbering, Verify timestamps) cannot be tested via UI as no interface exists
